title: Lag and dc randomly!
body: My league has been messing up hard for the last week. I will be playing a game and all of a sudden the ping will jump up to 200-800 and occasionally dc, sometimes staying disconnected for a while. I have sent a message to riot with no reply yet. I also called my ISP to see if anything was wrong on their end and nothing (of course).  What can I do?  My normal ping has been 60 for the last year with no new downloads ect

replies.body: I was unable to locate a ticket with the account you are posting from, but I'm happy to try and help.  If you are having random lag spikes and disconnections, then your network may be having problems.  Your best bet would be to go over every step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your network and configure your settings in order to maintain a steady connection to the game servers.  Let me know if you have any questions!
